column5: 11/11/11 11:11 remembrance day
Always tear up when I watch that.

Thanks for that Terry I always get teary this time of year, thinking of what dad and all the soldiers went through in the name of peace and freedom. Dad was in the 40 infantry workshop with the RCEME, in Korea.A month after him and mom were married, he was shipped off on the HMCS Athabaskan, and spent the next 13 months there.He kept what he saw and did there,hidden inside himself, and took it with him to the grave.
X2. Thx for putting this up Terry. God bless them all.
Thank you Terry for helping us never to forget .
they are all heros and deserve all the respect each and every day !!! we will never forget
That song never gets old! Always have to watch it a few times
Thanks for posting Terry.      Same here.
